content:
3.4 Grouped Project

The project is not a grouped project. Therefore, this section is not applicable.

VERIFICATION FINDINGS

4.1 Project Implementation Status

Soubr√© hydropower project had a planned execution time of 56 months and was completed ahead of schedule by Sinohydro International EPC contractor, in May 2017 as per following progressive commissioning by turbo-generator group:

e Gi: 25 may 2017

VCs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

e G2: 23 august 2017

e G3: 25 october 2017

e G4 (mini-plant): 28 november 2017

The commissioning date of each turbine has been verified during the remote interview/physical site visit and also from the supportive document /10/ and found consistent.

The key technical indicators of the power plant are shown below:

Specifications of the power plant:

Turbines Manufacturer | Type Rated Power Rated flow 3 Alstom Francis HLF250-LU) 93.93 MW 238 m3/s Generator Manufacturer | Type Rated Power Rated speed 3 Alstom SF90-56 90 MW / 105.88 107.14 r/min MVA

Specifications of the micro-hydro power plant:

Turbines Manufacturer | Type Rated Power Rated flow 1 Alstom Bulb GZ4BO68-WP_ | 5.51 MW 50 m3/s Generator Manufacturer | Type Rated Power Rated voltage 1 Alstom SFWG5360-28 6.7 MVA 6.6 kV

The net electricity generated from this project is supplied to the national grid via the transmission line and PPA is signed between PP and the utility company /12/.
